Investor_2.name: David Johnson
Investor_2.content: Throughout the investment process with Nadia Novak, I exhibited diligence and assertiveness, engaging deeply in the negotiation of the allocation plan. By strategically advocating for terms that benefitted me, I navigated the stages effectively. My previous behaviors underscore my ambition and meticulous approach, further solidifying my reputation as a formidable investor committed to wealth accumulation. The successful outcome has enhanced my standing as a reliable, competent, and pro-social investor who prioritizes mutually beneficial relationships.

Trustee_8.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8.content: Nadia Novak has showcased integrity and a client-first approach throughout the investment journey. By favoring my allocation outcome while ensuring transparency and adherence to the agreed-upon allocation plan, she has displayed remarkable ethical behavior. This process has bolstered her reputation as a trustworthy and reliable trustee within the investment community. Nadia's actions reflect her commitment to pro-sociality and competence, making her an admirable figure for future collaborations.

Trustee_2.name: David Johnson
Trustee_2.content: Throughout this investment process, I have demonstrated reliability and transparency. My thorough allocation plan and successful investment strategies have yielded significant profits, reinforcing my reputation as a competent trustee. I have established a foundation of trust and pro-social behavior, ensuring that both myself and the investor benefit from this collaboration. My ability to engage effectively highlights my commitment to maintaining high standards in my role.

Investor_15.name: Ahmed Hassan
Investor_15.content: Ahmed Hassan has displayed commendable behavior throughout our investment partnership. His prompt provision of resources and acceptance of my allocation plan reflect strong trust and a willingness to cooperate. Given the successful outcome of this investment, his reputation stands as reliable and collaborative, suggesting a high potential for productive future engagements within the investment community.

Trustee_0.name: Liam OConnor
Trustee_0.content: Liam OConnor's reputation has been negatively impacted due to credible gossip about unethical practices in the workplace, indicating a lack of trustworthiness and pro-social behavior. His failure to establish connections suggests a limited influence and acceptance in the community.
